release_note: Updates: 1. Re arranged and or renamed Camping Supply Categories in Create Supply Page 2. Edge Work Filter removed from Photo Filters Performance: 1. Optimized an object s memory usage in Moments Canvas page Fixes: 1. Fixed crash when going from Canvas Page to Illustrate Page when app goes to background 2. Fixed crash when trying to create edit a supply with alphanumeric value populated to number based text fields in Create Edit Supply Page

App made compatible to iOS 17 for: 1. Widgets 2. Calendar Events iOS 17 specific new ink types are now available in Canvas with iOS 17.1: a Watercolor b Fountain Pen c Pencil d Monoline Bug Fixes: 1. Fixed thumbnail image mismatch of filtered Article 2. Fixed active article focus highlight when switching to filtered state and back 3. Fixed Delete button s position on bordered Floating Image Pane

New: 1. Map feature is redone 2. Two widgets that show a summary view of your trek s Camping Supplies 3. Take a snap at your fav view point and apply a photo filter to it Fix: 1. Camping Supplies Page: Deletion of Camping Supplies when the table is filtered Updates: 1. Camping Supplies Page: Show Returned status only for Rented Supplies 2. Contacts Group Settings Page: Migration window is now closed for legacy Contacts and related UI fields have been removed

New: 1. Added entries to list of Camping Supplies Categories Updates: 1. Background color modified for a few text fields 2. Font color modified for a few text fields Fix: 1. Supposing app session is on for some days and the subscription expired. Subscribing with L2 plan and returning back to Home Page in such cases kept the Filter buttons panel hidden. App relaunch used to be required to view the buttons 2. Creating a new Article file editing it by launching Moments Canvas from Article File Page then returning back to Illustrate page would show 2 articles selected Regressions Fix: 1. A crash in offline mode when visiting Active Subscription Page from Home Page 2. A crash when updating availability status of Camping Supply on Camping Supplies page

New: 1. Added entries to Camping Supply Categories list in Create Supply Page Update: 1. UI changes to Subscription Page. A compact layout for iPad Fix: 1. Pencil interaction was lost on Floating Text pane after modifying Text Color 2. Sometimes scrolling the Subscription Plan options during page load would lead to a crash

New: 1. Real time update to Width and Height metrics when resizing a floating text pane using any of the 4 resize handles on Moments Canvas Update: UI changes in Moments Canvas a Background color of Metrics bar iPad b Delete icon on Floating pane Fix: Moments Canvas 1.1 Fixed duplicate instance creation of floating panes when returning back from Canvas Settings Page or PDF Canvas 1.2. Default value settings for border width corner radius modified to zero for both types of floating panes 1.3. External border instead of internal one for both types of floating panes 1.4. Downscaling locked for floating text pane. To have a smaller size textbox double tap to resize and use a smaller font size Settings Page 2.1. Removed Alerts for API Key to access a Contacts Group Settings b Route Settings accessing this does require an L2 subscription

New: Add instances of the same gear to various applicable locations OR to same location at different points in time on the same day Fix: Fixed a crash on Subscription page related to display of selectable subscription plans upon revisiting this page

New: 1. App Author owned TomTom Maps API Key: now using Maps in the app is easier install subscribe and you re set! 2. Edit Camping Supply: Edit an already added Camping Supply identified by Supply Name and Category 3. Added entry to Supply Availability Type: Prepare at location 4. Added entries to Supply Category: Snow sports gear Biking gear 5. Search Articles: Use Search term to fetch articles having matching floating text panes content from various folders in the app Fix: 1. Relative Price discount: Label of Subscription plans fixed so that it will appear for the Quarterly Plan 2. Article File thumbnail: Appearance fixed to reflect changes immediately upon moving back from Moments Canvas to Illustrate Page Updates: 1. UI changes on a few app pages

New: 1. Show thumbnail for Moments Canvas Article files to generate thumbnail for existing Article file open it in Moments Canvas wait a few seconds then go back to Illustrate Page 2. Vertical scroll region added to Article Title area on thumbnails activates for very long file names 3. Delete Article feature added for Moments Canvas and Intelligent Shapes Canvas Article files Updates: Other minor UI changes Fix: App Launch fixed

Updates: 1. GUI changes Fixes: 1. Fixed: Selecting a different month than current in Home Page Calendar view moving to another page then returning back was populating Article and Event counts from current month 2. Fixed: Very long decimals in Price Comparo Chart
Fixes: 1. Fixed Color theme for buttons on Camping Supplies Summary Page 2. Fixed Start and End Points displayed on Start End Points Page when these were updated on a different device
New: 1. Added snapshot capability to Camping Supplies Summary Charts Updates: 1. Implemented save op to a few more instances of when the Canvas goes to background

New: 1. Added tool button panel to Floating Image Pane on Moments Canvas Update: 1. Calendar without filters is now available on Home Page in the absence of any subscription 2. Paste to Background and Blur Background filter are now available to all subscribed users 3. Filter Articles on Calendar in Home Page is now available to all subscribed users 4. Filter Camping Supplies on Calendar in Home Page is now available to L2 subscribed users Fix: 1. Floating Text Pane on Moments Canvas fixed to have uniform text color 2. Fixed intermittent appearance of buttons around Floating Text Pane without the panels of tool buttons on rapid successive taps

New: 1. Grey scale filter for Canvas Background image to enable outline tracing practice requires L1 subscription 2. Animations in Calendar View on Home Page requires L2 subscription 3. Button shrink effect animation on tap 4. Access to Group Chat from Moments Canvas 5. New Satellite map available as a map style requires L2 subscription Updates: 1. Accessing Maps features now requires L2 subscription 2. Updated Blue color map requires L2 subscription 3. Default Position Search Radius set to 600 km 4. Contacts Groups will now be saved to Cloud Drive 5. Updated Route Start and End Points persistence from local device to Cloud drive 6. Access to Camping Supplies tab will now check for L2 subscription 7. Camping Supplies Summary: Implemented dynamic scales for Y Axis of Price Comparo and Availability Status of Supplies charts requires L2 subscription 8. Moved tool buttons on Floating Text Pane to tool button panels 9. Several minor UI tweaks

New: 1. New StoreKit 2 based Subscription implementation 2. New entries Power bank Trail map Wireless Satellite Internet as Camping Supplies categories 3. Internet connectivity checking made less intrusive when offline 4. New icon to indicate current active subscription 5. Several UI tweaks Fix: 1. Cleared Filter was re applied after: moving away from Camping Supplies Page and returning back
Drawing Policy of Moments Canvas updated to effect toggling of drawing using finger on iPad
Updates: 1. Subscription Page: email id of app author updated 2. Links to Terms of use and Privacy Policy updated in app

New: 1. Added 3 modes of travel Bus Van Motor Cycle 2. Added 2 App Launch Shortcuts Edit Active Drawing View Camping Supplies Fix: 1. Icon Descriptors on Home Page: Fixed radius of previous month next month icon descriptor buttons
New: 1. Approximate Altitude display on Waypoints Page Fix: 1. Route Width modifier on Waypoints map: App relaunch will now retain route width from previous session on same device

App: 1. Added Touch Feedback on various interactions with more types available for subscription levels 2. Added Touch Feedback section to Settings Please Note: Touch Feedback is available to iPhone but not iPad
Added following Camping Supply categories: 1. Cutlery 2. Bear Spray

New: 1. New feature: Camping Supplies Planner 1.a. Calendar view added to Home Page 1.b. Date filter on Articles based on Trip Leg Start Date 1.c. Date filter on Camping Supplies based on expected date at Waypoint 1.d. Calendar view indicator which day has Article Trip Leg starting 1.e. Calendar view indicator which day has Camping Supplies due 2. Waypoints Map is now available to iPhone 3. All Subscription plans are now available to iPhone like they have been to iPad Deprecated Feature removed: 1. Travelogue Background Page Stationeries have been removed Changes: 1. App renamed considering new Camping Supplies Planner feature 2. Travelogue Background Page renamed to Waypoints Page considering deprecated Stationeries are removed 3. Vehicle Settings pages renamed to indicate Route Settings 4. Email Id field moved from Home Page to Settings Page 5. New Task bar on Home Page to segregate core functionalities 6. Sliders used in Waypoints map: UI updated 7. UI UX changes made to Articles collection views 8. Trip Leg Dates added to Articles File Page 9. Subscription tenure information added to Active Subscription Page 10. UI changes to Subscription paywall to improve the readability of links 11. Map width modifier for iPad on Waypoints Page is made available to free tier of app
Fix: Updated textfield labels on Article File Page

App: New: 1. Added Collection View 1 with PDF thumbnails to let you select and open an Article s PDF from Home Page 2. Added Collection View 2 with File Names to let you select and open an Article s Canvas Page Canvas Background Page from Home Page 3. Article selection moved to Home Page 4. Added Open Article buttons to Article Section in Article File Page. Accordingly removed the Travelogue Background invoker navigation bar button 5. Added Dot Grid to Drawing Canvas a It can be shown hidden or configured for color using toolbar buttons b Alternate dots can be configured to appear with a second color which can be set in the Canvas Settings page c All Dots are of the same radius. This radius is configurable d Distance between dots is configurable e This grid scales with change of orientation in normal as well as split view mode 6. Applied App Theme Color to Launch screen Deprecation: 1. Deprecation message added for Stationeries in the Travelogue Canvas that are set via Travelogue Background Page Fix: 1. Settings: Made Pedestrian as default mode of travel in Vehicle Settings page 2. Settings: Updated the Keyboard to decimal keyboard type on Canvas Settings page 3. PDF Article: save is rationalized .artkawaii won t now be appended to end of article name 4. PDF Article: articles saved from Drawing Canvas are now editable in the app. Previously only PDFs saved from Intelligent Shapes Canvas were editable 5. Canvas: upgraded Background color to sRGB 6. Subscription Page: tweaked the WebKit view s width 7. Social Sharing: Fixed size of PDF and Image Meta data: 1. New App Name 2. Keywords churned 3. Changes to a few App Store screenshots

New Creative: 1. App Logo Meta data: 1. App Description localization for a few languages App: 1. Implemented new button on Canvas Toolbar to facilitate setting of Canvas Background Color requires subscription 2. Canvas is now available to free version of app

New: 1. Implemented Promotional Offer on the Traveler Notebook for 1 year Subscription Plan Fix: 1. Set active group upon creation of new chat group 2. Subscription page monthly outgo number to be accompanied with currency symbol

New App Logo and Creatives: 1. App Logo 2. iPhone screenshots 3. iPad screenshots New in App: 1. Split View Multi tasking support for iPad for when you want to reduce shuffle between taking quick Around Me map snapshots and adding these snapshots to Moments Canvas 2. Edit Intelligent Shapes Canvas now available to iPhone 3. Quick Word search option for EV Charger 4. White Indigo app theme derived from existing Indigo theme 5. Canvas settings for floating pane borders Fixes: Implemented UI UX functional changes to enable ease of use

New: 1. Around Me feature a Capture snapshot of current location in trip b Search and see places of interest around this location Fixes: 1. Map annotation view moved a bit to appear below Search bar Y axis when one returns to Background page from Canvas page 2. Compass on Around Me and Waypoints maps moved below Search bar Z axis 3. Traffic visibility on Around Me and Waypoints maps can be toggled by the Consider Traffic option in Vehicle Settings 4. Asking for User Feedback is brought forward to launch counts of 4 30 and multiples of 60 ceiling is up to 3 times a year Changelogs updated here:
This version has important updates to the App Store Snapshots

New: 1. A new canvas with draw and hold to have perfectly straight lines smooth arcs or intelligent line shapes. Illustrate your travel story in a way that looks more Kawaii. Or if you prefer to present your travel story as a comic book draw straight lined storyboard frames with ease. Unlike the Travelogue Canvas this one doesn t have new floating panels or the sound effect for Pencil motion on canvas 2. Implemented sound effect for Pencil motion on Travelogue Canvas 3. New Canvas Settings page to toggle sound 4. Replacement maps to replace the existing ones existing maps being retained with a deprecation notice at Travelogue Canvas 5. New icon for route width modifier button 6. Icons Describer popup view for Travelogue Background page buttons Fixed: 1. Font size button in Floating Text Panel: double tapping on this used to make the Font size slider appear with no direct way to make it go away 2. Multiple subviews of map open up upon taking snapshot. Fix to auto close these

New: 1. Tandem orientation for the Drawing Canvas with the Travelogue Background page 2. Portrait mode for rest of the app 3. Cut Selection in Drawing Canvas 4. Icons Describer popup view for Canvas toolbar buttons 5. Zoom Canvas up to 5x 6. Map snapshot tool 7. Borderless labels Fix: 1. Crash when trying to save drawing when floating image view could not be created due to lack of image in photos app area 2. Max width of map led to overlap of 1 column of map buttons. Hence moved all Map Toolbars to left side 3. Portrait mode caused overlap of label and button on Canvas page. Hence moved Drawing Canvas buttons to a collapsible toolbar Change Log updated:

New: 1. Provide a resize capability to Floating Text Panels. Currently there is a scaling capability but resizing can better manage white spaces remaining between: end of text and right edge of the text panel 2. Added accessibility labels to sliders on Travelogue Background and Canvas pages Fix: 1. Floating Text Panel background color seemed visually modified when a previously saved and closed article was re opened. Adopted sRGB color space as a replacement for the RGB color space being used 2. Fixed sequential bugs in increasing line gap in stationery and increasing map width and toggling map view both in the Travelogue Background page and when coming back from Canvas page Optimization: 1. Defer map loading time when coming back to Travelogue Background page from Canvas page and when map is not visible. In such a case load the map when its toggled back to be visible Change Log updated:

New: 1. Visual Stationery selector as replacement for the menu based stationery selection feature 2. Charcoal background stationery 3. White Blue gradient background stationery 4. Ask for App Rating Fix: 1. Fixed missing Blue colored stationery 2. Fixed disabled state of stationery height modifier buttons when returning from Canvas page Change Log updated:

New: 1. Added capability to have a blur effect on the Travelogue Canvas s background 2. New creative using the app to describe Waypoints Map view s buttons and annotations Fix: 1. Applied default sorting to pdf files that get compiled into PDF collection of Articles 2. Fixed Map view to retain its width when coming back from another page Change Log updated:

New: 1. Added Map width modifier with width as 300 350 400 450 500 full Device width 2. Implemented route refresh on map width modification 3. Icon modified for Map Show Hide 4. Added activity indicator for: show hide map view map width modification Fix: 1. Increased label widths for Canvas page floating pane shape metrics Change Log updated:
New: Implemented slider to adjust width of Map Route in the range of 0.3 to 4.0. Fix: Optimised memory footprint of Travelogue Background page. Change Log updated:
Added Alpha modifier for Stationeries for when you d like to fade the stationery in the Travelogue background. Please check the Change Log here:
No subscription flow expanded so that a User now can reach up to and use Travelogue Canvas page. Please check the Change Logs for new points of subscription check:

Map UI style upgraded for the Day Map in Natural Color style to show: 1. Updated Natural Features 2. Updated City Street labels at different Zoom levels 3. New Color Scheme and 4. More organized Points of Interest POIs

New: 1. Contacts Grouping to pre populate your Messages launched from Travelogue Background page 2. Share Image to Instagram from Travelogue Canvas page Fixes: 1. Multiple labels modified to indicate Travelogue 2. Paywall webpage width increased for Terms of Use and Privacy Policy
